short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to save code from code blocks on ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your experience on chatgpt.com with the "Save Code Button for ChatGPT" extension. This extension automatically adds a "Save Code" button to code blocks, enabling you to download code snippets in the appropriate file format with a single click.

Features:

Automatic Button Insertion: The "Save Code" button is automatically added to all code blocks on chatgpt.com.

Support for Multiple Languages: The extension supports a wide range of programming languages, saving code with the correct file extension.

Dynamic Content Handling: Automatically detects and adds the "Save Code" button to newly created code blocks without requiring a page refresh.

User-Friendly Interface: Buttons are visually integrated with the site's design, providing a seamless user experience.

Easy to Use: Simply click the "Save Code" button to download the code snippet in the appropriate format.
